targets.query: SELECT last("ifInOctets_rate") FROM "ports" WHERE ("hostname" = 'lab-fcx-stk.mfi.lab' AND "ifName" = 'ethernet1/1/1') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("ifOutOctets_rate") * 8 /1000000 FROM "ports" WHERE ("hostname" = 'lab-wan-agg-fcx.mfi.lab' AND "ifName" = 'ethernet1/1/1') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("ifInOctets_rate") * 8 /1000000 FROM "ports" WHERE ("hostname" = 'lab-wan-agg-fcx.mfi.lab' AND "ifName" = 'ethernet1/1/1') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("ifInOctets_rate") * 8 /1000000 FROM "ports" WHERE ("hostname" = 'lab-wan-agg-fcx.mfi.lab' AND "ifName" = 'ethernet1/1/1') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("ifOutOctets_rate") *8 AS "total" FROM  "ports" WHERE ("hostname" = 'lab-core-01-6610.mfi.lab' AND "ifName" =~ /(ethernet1\/3\/1|ethernet2\/3\/1)/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("ifInOctets_rate") *8 AS "total" FROM  "ports" WHERE ("hostname" = 'lab-core-01-6610.mfi.lab' AND "ifName" =~ /(ethernet1\/3\/1|ethernet2\/3\/1)/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("ifOutOctets_rate") *8 AS "total" FROM  "ports" WHERE ("hostname" = 'lab-core-01-6610.mfi.lab' AND "ifName" =~ /(ethernet1\/3\/2|ethernet2\/3\/2)/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("ifInOctets_rate") *8 AS "total" FROM  "ports" WHERE ("hostname" = 'lab-core-01-6610.mfi.lab' AND "ifName" =~ /(ethernet1\/3\/2|ethernet2\/3\/2)/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("ifOutOctets_rate") *8 AS "total" FROM  "ports" WHERE ("hostname" = 'lab-core-01-6610.mfi.lab' AND "ifName" =~ /(ethernet1\/3\/1|ethernet2\/3\/1)/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("ifOutOctets_rate") *8 AS "total" FROM  "ports" WHERE ("hostname" = 'lab-core-01-6610.mfi.lab' AND "ifName" =~ /(ethernet1\/3\/1|ethernet2\/3\/1)/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("ifOutOctets_rate") *8 AS "total" FROM  "ports" WHERE ("hostname" = 'lab-core-01-6610.mfi.lab' AND "ifName" =~ /(ethernet1\/3\/3|ethernet2\/3\/3)/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("ifInOctets_rate") *8 AS "total" FROM  "ports" WHERE ("hostname" = 'lab-core-01-6610.mfi.lab' AND "ifName" =~ /(ethernet1\/3\/3|ethernet2\/3\/3)/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
